headline: Temporal Joins the Agentic AI Foundation as a Gold Member to Advance Open Standards for Production Agent Workloads
summary: SEATTLE, December 10, 2025--Temporal Technologies, the creators of the open-source Durable Execution platform Temporal.io and the enterprise-grade managed service Temporal Cloud, today announced that the company has joined the newly formed Agentic AI Foundation (AAIF) as a Gold Member. Hosted by the Linux Foundation, AAIF is a neutral, open foundation dedicated to advancing agentic AI through community-governed standards and shared infrastructure.

content.title: Temporal Joins the Agentic AI Foundation as a Gold Member to Advance Open Standards for Production Agent Workloads

Hosted by the Linux Foundation, AAIF is a neutral, open foundation dedicated to advancing agentic AI through community-governed standards and shared infrastructure.
